title: 香港大學對"疫情"驚人發現 點解無媒體敢報?

replies.msg:
https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/eid/article/26/5/19-0994_article
先放source
美國CDC 認證香港大學出品
內容係戴口罩 原來係對"防疫"無撚用
除非你有醫學知識咁戴n95級別以上/豬咀
最有用係洗手 保持hand hygiene

Disposable medical masks (also known as surgical masks) are loose-fitting devices that were designed to be worn by medical personnel to protect accidental contamination of patient wounds, and to protect the wearer against splashes or sprays of bodily fluids (36). There is limited evidence for their effectiveness in preventing influenza virus transmission either when worn by the infected person for source control or when worn by uninfected persons to reduce exposure. Our systematic review found no significant effect of face masks on transmission of laboratory-confirmed influenza.

唔係我講 係香港大學班researcher 講
香港人戴咁耐口罩從來都係無用
只係沒頭沒腦不理智地跟風
最後向權力交出人身自由
你要反駁 "戴口罩都有d 用" 請出篇 research essay 去反駁香港大學

replies.msg: 二三輪爆發係因為柒婆引入一堆唔撚帶口罩嘅人上岸呀
唔需要research essay去反駁, 全球各地疫情情況已經證明左個研究有bias, 而且絕大多數新出既research及後數年都無人理會或證明是錯誤的, 所以新既研究結果係需要經過時間既考驗, 戴口罩不一定有用但一定是無害的, 令左戴口罩既人擁有一個正向既有利情況, 有時間建議你讀下Taleb既書, 可以減少你對權威既崇拜, Research or Essay 要服從事實, 而唔係調番轉頭

'...Most studies were underpowered because of limited sample size, and some studies also reported suboptimal adherence in the face mask group.'

在講Surface and Object Cleaning的部份:
'Although we found no evidence that surface and object cleaning could reduce influenza transmission, this measure does have an established impact on prevention of other infectious diseases.'

'Respiratory etiquette is often listed as a preventive measure for respiratory infections. However, there is a lack of scientific evidence to support this measure. Whether respiratory etiquette is an effective nonpharmaceutical intervention in preventing influenza virus transmission remains questionable, and worthy of further research.'


還有,講influenza的study,推廣到武漢肺炎 - 一個連mode of transmission,pathogenesis 都不知道的病, 這是 overgeneralisation。

這樣質素的paper都有膽出,CDC又肯出,事情真的很神奇。

replies.msg:
成因

傷風及流感可以由超過二百種的病毒所引致。主要傳染的途徑有﹕

空氣傳染﹕吸入空氣中較大的呼吸分泌物粒子或長時間懸浮在空氣中細小的傳染粒子﹔或
接觸傳染﹕接觸皮膚上及環境表面上帶有傳染性的呼吸分泌物，然後接觸眼睛或鼻子。
疲倦及暴露於戶外寒冷的空氣並不會引致傷風。https://www.chp.gov.hk/tc/static/80047.html

呢樣野先係令個感染控制成功既關鍵

Most studies were underpowered because of limited sample size, and some studies also reported suboptimal adherence in the face mask group.

In theory, transmission should be reduced the most if both infected members and other contacts wear masks, but compliance in uninfected close contacts could be a problem (12,34). Proper use of face masks is essential because improper use might increase the risk for transmission (39). Thus, education on the proper use and disposal of used face masks, including hand hygiene, is also needed.

篇文只係話未搵到證據，唔係話無用

replies.msg: 都係

係流感唔係武漢肺炎呀， 繼續戴口罩啦

Abstract
There were 3 influenza pandemics in the 20th century, and there has been 1 so far in the 21st century. Local, national, and international health authorities regularly update their plans for mitigating the next influenza pandemic in light of the latest available evidence on the effectiveness of various control measures in reducing transmission. Here, we review the evidence base on the effectiveness of nonpharmaceutical personal protective measures and environmental hygiene measures in nonhealthcare settings and discuss their potential inclusion in pandemic plans. Although mechanistic studies support the potential effect of hand hygiene or face masks, evidence from 14 randomized controlled trials of these measures did not support a substantial effect on transmission of laboratory-confirmed influenza. We similarly found limited evidence on the effectiveness of improved hygiene and environmental cleaning. We identified several major knowledge gaps requiring further research, most fundamentally an improved characterization of the modes of person-to-person transmission.

睇清楚啲先出post啦好心

你淨係quote人一個section無意思

首先篇文主要係做唔同措施對傳染病控制嘅meta analysis - 即係review其他studies

入邊有講其他measures例如洗手，咳同打乞嗤時遮口鼻。咁到底會唔會有interactive effects呢？篇文無研究過；只係分開討論每樣。如果有，你唔可以話口罩無撚用。用例子答你：如果會接觸到空氣病原情況下，你唔洗手捽眼口鼻戴P100都無用，反之亦然，你唔戴口罩但乜都唔掂一樣吸曬空氣病原體；而兩個interventions 夾埋又可能有第種效果[正正/負負/正負］。

正正因為可以有好多因素影響傳染程度，所以要注意篇文嘅研究方法係咪有效得出樓豬嘅結論。篇文口罩個部分只有十個研究做過，有啲係hall，有啲係household，先唔講上高提過其他感染控制措施，呢啲雜燴studies中有飛沬以外嘅傳染方式，而口罩係控制飛沬傳染，你自己諗下你沖涼時帶唔到口罩又同一屋簷下會點。作者都有提及sample size問題：Most studies were underpowered because of limited sample size, and some studies also reported suboptimal adherence in the face mask group.

所以，拉。

replies.msg:
傳播途徑
流感病毒主要透過患者咳嗽、打噴嚏或說話時產生的飛沫傳播，亦可透過直接接觸患者的分泌物而傳播。

傳播途徑及潛伏期(武漢肺炎)
經呼吸道飛沫傳播是主要的傳播途徑，亦可通過接觸傳播。現時對潛伏期的估計大多是1到14天，最常見的是5天左右。

Source 衛生防護中心

控制到就唔會有第二三輪爆發啦 你睇下日本個graph先啦

replies.msg:
多倫多今個有反口罩示威，佢老尾，咁撚大地方，人口得香港三分一。。今日五百幾單。

有條友叫人帶口罩今日，比人打到無左幾隻牙。

鬼佬死晒佢就岩嫁啦。

樓主個篇野講緊流感，仲要review得10篇有關口罩同埋樓主篇野本身有寫口罩加洗手可以減低其他感染(流感以外感染)
However, as with hand hygiene, face masks might be able to reduce the transmission of other infections and therefore have value in an influenza pandemic when healthcare resources are stretched.
同埋講左唔肯定既原因係因為流感傳播機制未被完全肯定
It is essential to note that the mechanisms of person-to-person transmission in the community have not been fully determined.

"你要反駁 "戴口罩都有d 用" 請出篇 research essay 去反駁香港大學"
FYI 依篇係社交距離,口罩,眼保護對Covid 綜合172篇既meta analysis
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7263814/
入面講左口罩有用，加上眼保護更加有用
These data also suggest that wearing face masks protects people (both health-care workers and the general public) against infection by these coronaviruses, and that eye protection could confer additional benefit.
不論對醫護人員同大眾都係。
The use of face masks was protective for both health-care workers and people in the community exposed to infection, with both the frequentist and Bayesian analyses lending support to face mask use irrespective of setting.
結論樓主弱智斷章取義

replies.msg:
再多兩篇support
Efficacy of face mask in preventing respiratory virus transmission: A systematic review and meta-analysis
https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1477893920302301
The effectiveness of masks has been proven in different settings, populations, and areas.

Face masks prevent transmission of respiratory diseases: a meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.07.31.20166116v1
The meta-analysis of existing randomized control studies found support for the efficacy of face masks among the general public. Our results show that face masks protect populations from infections and do not pose a significant risk to users.

quote.msg: ................Our systematic review found no significant effect of face masks on transmission of laboratory-confirmed influenza.
Not COVID-19
個size差唔多
